landing.header: All the paths you didn't go..
landing.headerAction: You can now explore them all!
landing.intro: At LearnGraph, we believe everyone deserves to forge their own unique path. We're building an interactive, dynamic map of knowledge – a sort of Google Maps for learning – designed to empower you to navigate a world of endless opportunities tailored to your passions. Our platform is actively in development and driven by community collaboration. Join our <linktodiscord>Community of Practice</linktodiscord> on Discord and help shape the future of education!
landing.missionStatementText: Co-creating the future of education - free for everyone. We enable people to learn, independent of their situation in life and the resources at their disposal. Read our whitepaper here.
landing.podcastAlternative: Prefer listening? Try our podcast alternative and embark on an audio journey with us!

about.Storyp: After living in a Buddhist temple, Laurin came back with no agenda—just presence. He listened. One day, a friend said, “Wouldn’t it be cool if learning worked like Google Maps?” The idea sat in the space between them, waiting. Laurin picked it up. Soon, others joined. That’s how LearnGraph quietly began.
about.Our-Team-text: We’re not just building a platform—we’re living the practice.
about.team-Efecan: Head of Educational Strategy and Innovation
about.quote-Laurin: The best ideas come from stillness. LearnGraph wasn’t built to disrupt — it was built to listen, to guide, and to grow with those who are ready to listen.
about.quote-Nama: The world is a really big place and there are people that have been privilleged with resources, it's the duty of those people to help the ones without
about.quote-Efecan: Education is not about filling a vessel, but about kindling a flame - and I intend to set the whole system ablaze.
about.quote-Talal: It's scary out there, but we were never meant to be alone. Whats important isn't what I can do for me its what everyone can do for the human race
about.team-placeholder-description: We’re always looking for curious minds to join us. Whether you code, care about learning, or just have a wild idea—come say hi. <discord>Join our Discord</discord>, or send us a message to <email>jobs@learngraph.org</email>!

soon.spreadSupport: Spread the Word & Support the Cause
soon.productSoon: Our product is soon ready for demo and we’re launching a non-profit initiative in Africa with

university.heroHeadline: Empower Your Institution with Data-Driven Insights
university.heroText: Transform your educational ecosystem with personalized analytics, hybrid learning solutions, and seamless interoperability.

challenge1.headline: Enhanced Retention
challenge1.text: Support students before subtle disengagement occurs by proactively addressing early warning signs. Optimize support to boost retention without casting blame.

challenge2.headline: Integrated Pathways
challenge2.text: Break down silos in your curriculum to connect interdisciplinary courses. Enable smoother transitions and enhanced academic mobility across departments.

challenge3.headline: Data to Action
challenge3.text: Transform your existing data into actionable strategies. Convert insights into targeted interventions that support student success.

challenge4.headline: Seamless Interoperability
challenge4.text: Align your systems with European standards to create a unified ecosystem that recognizes learning achievements across borders.

insight1.title: 23% Graduation Increase
insight1.description: Georgia State University used predictive analytics to target at-risk students, resulting in a 23% increase in graduation rates and a 5% decrease in the achievement gap.

insight2.title: 5% decreased achievement gap
insight2.description: The University of Arizona's personalized interventions based on predictive analytics led to a 7% increase in retention rates and a 10% boost in graduation rates.

insight3.title: 30% Retention Improvement
insight3.description: Studies suggest that sophisticated learning analytics can improve student retention by up to 30%, demonstrating the power of technology in education.

insight4.title: 11% Reduced failure rates
insight4.description: A meta-analysis shows active learning reduces failure rates from 32% to 21% and improves exam performance significantly, underscoring its benefits in STEM courses.

university.insightsSummary: Collectively, these insights demonstrate that data-driven interventions and active learning strategies can significantly enhance student retention, reduce failure rates, and boost graduation outcomes.

solution1.headline: Hybrid Learning Containers
solution1.text: Our platform creates flexible, learner-centered spaces that blend digital and physical experiences. These containers can host interactive demos and multimedia content to support dynamic learning.

solution2.headline: Peer-Coaching & Mentorship
solution2.text: We foster robust networks of peer coaches and mentors that provide personalized support. This community-based approach builds confidence and enhances academic outcomes.

solution3.headline: Interoperability & Open-Source Infrastructure
solution3.text: LearnGraph aligns with the European Learning Model (ELM) and ESCO Skills & Competencies, enabling seamless recognition of academic progress across institutions with a scalable, open-source framework.

cta.headline: Experience the Future of Education
cta.text: Discover how our innovative, data-driven platform transforms insights into actionable strategies that enhance student success and institutional growth.

individual.heroHeadline: Your Personal Guide to Master Anything
individual.heroText: Say goodbye to one-size-fits-all courses. LearnGraph helps you chart your own learning journey with guidance, real-world relevance, and personal feedback.

challenge1.headline: Too Generic
challenge1.text: Most platforms offer one path for everyone. But you’re not everyone. Your goals, pace, and style deserve a unique map.

challenge2.headline: Hard to Stay Motivated
challenge2.text: Without real-world relevance or a sense of progress, even the best learners lose steam. It’s not your fault — the system wasn’t built for you.

challenge3.headline: Information Overload
challenge3.text: So many courses. So little clarity. What should you learn next? What actually helps your career or curiosity?

challenge4.headline: Learning Alone
challenge4.text: Learning without community or support is hard. We’re wired to grow with others — not in isolation.

insight1.title: 80% forget most content within a week
insight1.description: Studies show that without active strategies, learners forget up to 80% of material in just 7 days.

insight2.title: Personalized learning boosts outcomes by 30%
insight2.description: Learners following personalized paths report significantly higher retention and satisfaction.

insight3.title: Peer learning increases motivation
insight3.description: Learning alongside others — through coaching or community — can double your engagement levels.

insight4.title: Real-world projects > theory
insight4.description: Hands-on, relevant projects lead to deeper learning and skill application than theory-heavy content alone.

individual.insightsSummary: You deserve a learning platform that works with your brain, not against it. That’s where LearnGraph comes in.

solution1.headline: A Map Just for You
solution1.text: No more guesswork. We help you see where you are, where you want to go, and how to get there — backed by your learning style and personal goals.

solution2.headline: You’re Not Alone
solution2.text: LearnGraph includes built-in mentorship and coaching features to keep you supported, connected, and progressing.

solution3.headline: Learn What Matters
solution3.text: From soft skills to tech stacks, our learning paths are designed with industry input so you build things that actually make sense in the real world.

cta.headline: Join the Movement. Shape the Future.
cta.text: Be part of something different. Try our prototype, join our Discord, or help us bring learning to life through community and crowdfunding.

institutions.heroText: Your team deserves better than outdated PDFs and passive videos. LearnGraph helps you deliver personalized, high-impact training — and measure what truly works.

challenge1.headline: One-Size Training Doesn’t Fit
challenge1.text: Traditional training is static and generic. Every employee learns differently — your upskilling shouldn’t feel like a lecture.

challenge2.headline: Low Engagement, High Drop-off
challenge2.text: If training feels disconnected from real work or personal goals, employees tune out. Engagement drops — and so does impact.

challenge3.headline: Hard to Track ROI
challenge3.text: You invest in learning. But what’s working? LearnGraph helps you link training to real results through insights and progress data.

challenge4.headline: Too Much Setup. Not Enough Value.
challenge4.text: Complex platforms create more friction than flow. LearnGraph plugs into your workflow with minimal setup and maximum clarity.

insight1.title: Personalized paths = better retention
insight1.description: Employees who follow tailored training routes retain knowledge better and apply skills faster on the job.

insight2.title: Real-world practice boosts results
insight2.description: Training linked to actual tasks (like ERP or cybersecurity workflows) leads to faster adaptation and fewer errors.

insight3.title: Engagement matters
insight3.description: Interactive, meaningful learning doubles completion rates and boosts team morale.

insight4.title: Actionable data unlocks ROI
insight4.description: LearnGraph connects learning outcomes with KPIs so you can track what drives impact — not just clicks.

institutions.insightsSummary: Better training isn’t just content — it’s connection, clarity, and feedback. LearnGraph helps you deliver all three.

solution1.headline: GPS for Skill Development
solution1.text: Like Google Maps for learning. Employees see where they are, what skills they need, and how to reach their goals efficiently.

solution2.headline: Plug & Play Insights
solution2.text: Our dashboards surface what’s working — and what’s not — across departments, teams, and individuals. No PhD in analytics required.

solution3.headline: Training That Sticks
solution3.text: Employees get what they need, when they need it — with interactive modules tied to real tools like ERP, cybersecurity, and more.

cta.headline: Let’s Build Smarter Training Together
cta.text: Ready to amplify your impact? Schedule a free call to explore how LearnGraph can integrate with your existing training efforts.

nonprofits.heroHeadline: Partner for Impact: Transform Learning Where It Matters Most
nonprofits.heroText: LearnGraph empowers underserved learners through scalable, personalized, and community-driven education — even where infrastructure is limited.

challenge1.headline: High Teacher-Student ratio
challenge1.text: High student-teacher ratios make it nearly impossible to give every learner the attention they need to succeed.

challenge2.headline: No Internet, No Access
challenge2.text: Most EdTech solutions rely on high-speed internet. But in many regions, this simply isn’t an option — leaving learners behind.

challenge3.headline: Volunteer Burnout
challenge3.text: Volunteers are doing their best — but they can’t be everywhere at once. They need smart tools to scale their efforts.

challenge4.headline: No Way to Measure Impact
challenge4.text: Nonprofits struggle to show clear learning outcomes, making it harder to secure funding and grow their programs.

nonprofits.insightsTitle: What’s Possible with the Right Tools

insight1.title: Self-Learning Increases Retention
insight1.description: Students given structured autonomy with LearnGraph show improved understanding — even without constant supervision.

insight2.title: Offline Access = Lifeline
insight2.description: With downloadable resources and AI-based tutors, students can continue learning even when the internet is down.

insight3.title: AI Supports Human Educators
insight3.description: LearnGraph’s assistant tools help volunteers give better guidance — and spend more time where it matters most.

insight4.title: Impact You Can Measure
insight4.description: Track progress at scale with data dashboards tailored for NGOs, donors, and educational partners.

nonprofits.insightsSummary: From remote villages to urban classrooms, LearnGraph supports equitable learning with personalized content, AI tools, and measurable outcomes.
nonprofits.solutionsTitle: Built for Community, Powered by Technology

solution1.headline: Self-Paced, Guided Learning — Anywhere
solution1.text: Whether offline or online, every student can follow a dynamic learning journey tailored to their pace, level, and goals.

solution2.headline: AI That Helps Humans Help Others
solution2.text: AI tutors offer instant support and feedback — boosting learning in places where teachers or volunteers are stretched thin.

solution3.headline: Measure What Matters
solution3.text: Equip your organization with transparent learning metrics and reports that donors and partners actually care about.

cta.headline: Let’s Scale Impact Together
cta.text: Join forces to empower the next generation of learners. Partner with LearnGraph to extend access, measure success, and drive systemic change.

uspBlocks.reduceDropoutText: LearnGraph helps your students stay on track with personalized learning paths, peer coaching, and emotional reflection — all built into a platform that works alongside your existing systems.
uspBlocks.yourWayText: Tired of one-size-fits-all learning? LearnGraph shows you exactly where you are, where you want to go, and how to get there — with smart guidance, real resources, and peer support.
uspBlocks.upskillText: Whether it’s soft skills or digital tools, LearnGraph guides adult learners step-by-step with peer support and real-world relevance.
uspBlocks.openSourceText: We don’t chase profit. We chase purpose. Your support goes directly into scaling impact across the Global South.
uspBlocks.finalCTAText: Discover how our platform transforms your life's journey.

infoBlocks.companiesHeadline: Reskill, upskill, or just grow — without losing your mind.
infoBlocks.independentHeadline: No more guessing. You now have a GPS for your learning journey.
infoBlocks.fundersHeadline: Invest in an education system that doesn’t just teach — it transforms.
